backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no functions or state.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing features, affected files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing purpose and styling notes for various frontend files.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind base defining color variables, dark mode values, and shared border/background styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point preloading audio and mounting the root React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app component assembling layout, background, modals, grids, and global audio hooks.
frontend/src/components/background/Cinem: Background video component with autoplay handling and gradient overlays.
frontend/src/components/calculator/LiveC: Interactive scheme calculator computing maturity values with sliders, inputs, and animated result state.
frontend/src/components/footer/Footer.ts: Footer showing copyright and disclaimer text with official styling.
frontend/src/components/gallery/GalleryC: Clickable gallery card playing tap sound and displaying icon, label, and hover effects.
frontend/src/components/gallery/galleryI: Exports a list of gallery image metadata including src, filename, and alt text.
frontend/src/components/gallery/GalleryL: A lightbox component that displays a full-screen image preview with navigation, download, and close controls, using click-sound feedback.
frontend/src/components/gallery/GalleryM: A modal gallery viewer showing image thumbnails and launching a lightbox with keyboard navigation and download support.
frontend/src/components/header/FrostedHe: Renders the site header with title, IT 2.0 button, and location pill while controlling the IT 2.0 modal state.
frontend/src/components/header/It20Modal: A modal describing India Post IT 2.0 with ESC/backdrop close handling and click-sound feedback.
frontend/src/components/ippb/IppbGridCar: A grid card that opens an IPPB overlay dialog and features interactive 3D logo visuals with tap-sound activation.
frontend/src/components/ippb/IppbOverlay: An overlay dialog presenting IPPB service categories with icons and descriptions, closing via shadcn dialog events.
frontend/src/components/layout/Dashboard: Simple layout wrapper providing a full-screen container for nested dashboard content.
frontend/src/components/motto/RightEdgeM: Displays a fixed vertical motto along the right edge of the screen on large displays.
frontend/src/components/profile/BpmProfi: Profile card that expands into a detailed overlay with bio text, image, and typewriter effect, using click sounds.
frontend/src/components/profile/Typewrit: Typewriter component that renders lines sequentially with typing animation.
frontend/src/components/prompt/PromptCop: UI section showing a predefined clone prompt with a copy-to-clipboard button and feedback.
frontend/src/components/schemes/SchemeCa: Clickable card for a postal scheme showing icon, label, and description with sound feedback.
frontend/src/components/schemes/SchemeGr: Grid layout rendering all scheme cards plus gallery and IPPB cards.
frontend/src/components/schemes/SchemeMo: Modal displaying detailed scheme info with tabs and close sound.
frontend/src/components/schemes/SchemeTa: Tabbed interface showing scheme history, eligibility, benefits with calculator, and documents.
frontend/src/components/schemes/useSchem: Hook managing scheme modal open state and selected scheme ID.
frontend/src/components/support/CallFloa: Floating call button linking to a phone number with glow and animation.
frontend/src/components/support/WhatsApp: Floating WhatsApp contact button with tooltip and animated glow.
frontend/src/components/testimonials/Tes: Auto-scrolling testimonial marquee duplicating entries for seamless animation.
frontend/src/data/schemes.ts: Defines scheme types, tab content, calculator configs, and a full dataset for various postal savings schemes.
frontend/src/data/testimonials.ts: Provides a typed list of customer testimonials with id, name, location, and message.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor using React Query and Internet Identity.
frontend/src/hooks/useAudioUnlock.ts: Adds one-time global listeners to unlock audio playback on first user interaction.
frontend/src/hooks/useClickSound.ts: Provides tap and close sound effects with preload, debouncing, and cleanup logic.
frontend/src/hooks/useGlobalTapSound.ts: Registers a global pointer-down listener to play tap sounds with throttling and input-field exclusions.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity context, login handling, identity persistence, and provider setup.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind-based global styles, dark theme variables, utility classes, and animations.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind config defining dark mode, content paths, extended color palette, shadows, radii, and custom keyframe animations.
project_state.json: Project state metadata containing version info, rollback-related issues, and feature requests to remove recent blinking visual changes.
